snippet: Increasingly, the Syrian state appears to have lost not just its monopoly on violence but also its monopoly on information.
abstract: Increasingly, the Syrian state appears to have lost not just its monopoly on violence but also its monopoly on information.

headline.main: Push by Syrian Rebels Opens Space for Foreign Journalists to Report on Conflict
